item.title: Calling That Cant Be Called Sunglasses in the Rain
item.description: Sweep yo mammas porch v1 by POLIW.AT ^ bad draft but I gotta get it online feelin so paranoid about losing work today so Imma invest in my future self or whatever 718pm.gmt im calling out today is not the day for pulling punches heading to campus to return that sata cable to kent spent the morning on hunter’s couch listening and watchin my tunes

item.title: Do 1000 Sets
item.description: Freestyler's Anonymous VOL 1 by POLIW.AT 636 AM{{gmt}} hunter and I are figuring out the vocal sample and I’m living in the future now or past don’t know care or remember because I wanted to start a new document, the last one was getting too long. only so much you should share in a day. we’re still editing that twilight zone sample effects, working to get it glissening and clear in the mix,

item.title: Betts on Dibs
item.description: Freestyler's Anonymous VOL 1 by POLIW.AT 832 am spent last 2 weeks crying a little each day never fail to find a new reason to cry this time its an understatement to that that I miss you it that I need to find the solution to make it easy for you to be here by my side thats why i dont sleep thats why I grind bout to jerk off by the beach in my exs corolla pass out then cum too stayed up all night cept when I passed out under studio b desk and came to and thought of you this time this gaggle has the same patagucci jacket i lost i dont remembr which time i rememebr it was worht the audio to be with me it to be intense that much ive figured out in time and my ex didnt respect her time and cam has been doing it for years most of the time and ted needs to be produced shes underutilized and jack needs to stop thinking in circles and ive gotta grind and get a job to make it easy for you to spend time a humble request for the one i love every single time and this is bad banter cause i haven't slept cause i think of you all the time and sleeping is not solving this problem of mine almost done with my killswitch / job app so imma find the next task for making something 'good' at the beach and when i come to i know itll be you immediately on my mind upon waking every single time see you soon 1035am

item.title: My First Patron Bout to Hike and Get Lost
item.description: pbd theme variation -pi by POLIW.AT 812PM just got back from a hike all day through the cuts || san vicente creek -=–==-=–=-==-=-=–=-=- 834PM made a new sing song piano time just now was crying about 3PAC for some reason reading old youtube comments on one of his videos while taking a shit and brianna was in the bathroom too this morning I think I’m getting choked up about 3PAC a lot via the transitive property because

item.title: Today Audio Gets Fields and Evolutionary ideas of love
item.description: Addy Daddy type beat by POLIW.AT ^ today im on 748AM on Cam’s couch listening to tape I cut last night - almost done with the gestapo verb but couldn’t quite finish it up my tracks need coords I’ll figure it out by the end of the day wanna get to stanford tonight or tomorrow and see charlotte and we’re going to record and catchup playing back monterey homies and trianna singing autumn leaves audio of when I was riding the rim up empire grade 5 am in a storm and a lockheed martin employee pulled over and told me I'd be fine if I drove on it another mile and a half not lying its hosted on 00jew my old xbox account if github bans me I'll lose everything though I love every race like any good ex druggy if its not offensive to me then i can spell it out laugh and love jack every time for the rest of my life every race gets love and has aspects that suck and he's sucking right now without failure borderline personality disorder that not my words I just take a quote his idea of me doesn't extend much beyond that idea of himself though used as a crutch I just as bad{a hypocrite} smoking with a black lung so I know to give more love next time we talk I need time cause everyone looks stupid when they share opinions for longer than 3 minutes and this just half of it gus has 1 more call then we hit Atlas close to his work so I in ordinance and love silently from a distance 929am

item.title: Pullout on a Pullout in Matts Prius
item.description: I am soup by POLIW.AT 1059AM in the back of matt’s prius Im trying to change the milo song and he’s shouting at me he said you have to just take no for answer and I understand that, but there was enough time to switch the song for sure ahahahahah .. slept at his girlfriend Julia’s house and we all had breaky bagels and eggs and it was sick. Had a sweet session at cam ted gus’s last night - Denis was there too !

item.title: Mama Gave Me Money for a Trackphone
item.description: too many phones kickback by POLIW.AT ^ callback - no access to a way to fix the mixing but <3 it regardless 839AM on BART heading from fremont to Ashby to see jack briconomu dropped me off at the surgery section of the hospital and I took a clean shit I look over grown and worn, but the people on the bart were overly nice to me when I asked for directions.

item.title: Dad Fixed My Keys Insomnia Fixed My Music
item.description: Freestyler's Anonymous VOL 1 by POLIW.AT ^ freestyles from the sunday drive in the car ^ what you should never hear and I should write down {{ last day of college career and still thinkin about it }} 1023AM just woke up - and went to the garage and my dad was fixing my yahama privia keyboard - 88 weighted keys, it’s been offline for years and I used it in college.

item.title: Where It Goes Without an Outlet
item.description: ^ freestyle session chadMike, don’t have access to anything except that’s already online today. a fun night, gets better as the time goes on 419AM when you have a bunch to make and there's no outlet setup cute if you're thinking of an outlet now future michael its cute that you think you exist future michael I write this because I'm not letting you exist future michael you're a piece of shit and you need to go away future michael I've taken a stance and you know I'm stubborn future michael let me get out the shower then we'll talk future michael I'm not expecting anything from you future michael I've made up my mind will work through it this time future michael You don't even know what I've given up for you future michael You reap the benefits while I suffer in the moment future michael suck your own dick for God's sake if you care about me future michael I'm michael from the past about to take a shower just to stay awake future michael 2 1/2 more hours in me of work if I'm strategic future michael who could possibly sleep ever at this age future michael You about to be 27 you need to act future michael don't give me a verse give me a drink on an open tab future michael your friend's cards work but you don't future michael I'm projecting I know you work that's a fact future michael don't listen to me when I'm acting out future michael you're lucky I didn't pull the trigger tonight future michael cause I'm at the end of the line future michael I don't know how to ask for help and never did future michael apparently good at getting it that's how I got this far future michael you need not worry when I've been long dead since the time you read this future michael I won't kill you but I still live in your sub conscious future michael so suck my dick and give thanks, it's a wonder that you are still here to read this today - cause tonight I was at the end of my rope future michael walked across the railing of a bridge to test it future michael you're a piece of shit reincarnated future michael hopefully what's beyond your control won't be judged future michael purgatory's for robots that front as humans future michael paradiso is in your future future michael 524am

item.title: Only Savage Edits
item.description: Never considered for mass production by POLIW.AT ^ no access to my latest stuff and yet this is me today 1230AM thank god I got my lappy back, it took from midnight to 11 AM yesterday to get this fixed - now migrating the websites and now launching this one as the new new poliwat. stayed up all night fixing it then drove quickly to the beach to record some audio journal and guitar

item.title: About Page on the Beta Poliwat Site
item.description: 848PM and you can find it here https://beta.poliw.at/about/ asdpl[sdafkopadjkdfasjksdfajksdfadfadfjaasdfjka] oh and ### https://alpha.poliw.at/ now up its the earlier logs (when I can pay soundcloud the audio works on that site, have since moved to bandcamp ++ private urls) spendin the day fixing laptop ++ surviving, not making post other than this

item.title: God Threw Me a Storm and Out Came a Peroscope
item.description: ^ fitting I was never considered for mass production 1904 @ saturn with briconomu I’ll describe the storm later tonight. We’re going to head to see some movie at 8 pm about some penniless artist boyfriend - perfect == thats me! It’s called never look away - going to sneak in 2 four locos, Before I get into it, this is the birth of the 3rd iteration of the poliwat log sites.

item.title: That one time(2nd) Everything Broke Everything
item.description: wed 2/25/19 1109 am just woke up poliwat gets a new site cause I got a virus and lost everything but an export on the previous one - you can find those logs here https://beta.poliw.at last night recorded jordan’s set at take over tuesdat I worked the door at the back and front and read the simululations of god and talked about it to whoever asked || bunch of nice people but chris was way too fucked up but he just got back from paris so idk maybe he’s depressed about coming back
